item.description:
Join members and guests of the SSDOMG for a Saturday Afternoon Ice Cream Social sure to help cool you down on a hot summer's day. We will be checking out the newest ice cream shop on the South Shore. For those who would like to continue socializing after, we can socialize at the 9-Hole Mini Putt Putt located behind the Ice Cream stand.

Location: Crescent Ridge Dair Bar, 176 South Franklin Street (Route 37S), Holbrook

Website: www.crescentridge.com

Date: Saturday, August 25th

Time: 3pm

Meeting Place: Outside Crescent Ridge Dairy Bar

Costs and Fees: $1 event fee per person, pay for your own ice cream (prices range from $3 to $12+)

Min/Max & Guests: Ice Cream Rules! No min, no max, up to 3 Guests (including children as long as you maintain responsibility for them)

Deadline: Saturday, August 25th @ 11am (RSVP list will be printed around or after this time. Email RSVP changes thereafter.)

We will be expecting all those who said YES and hope to see all those who said MAYBE.

Organizer: Kathy R :)



Directions: Located near Holbrook Center on Route 37 (SB side) approximately 1/2 mile south of the intersection of Route 139 next to The Halfway Cafe where CoCo's Ice Cream used to be located.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Afternoon Ice Cream Social!
